1.label: Check-in at YYZ Terminal 3
1.notes: WESTJET Flight WS 34 - Toronto to Dublin. Arrive at least 2 hours before departure. Terminal 3, Toronto Pearson International Airport.

1.label: Security & Boarding
1.notes: Security screening and final boarding procedures. Flight departs at 22:10 (10:10 PM).

1.label: Flight WS 34: YYZ to DUB
1.notes: WESTJET Flight WS 34. Economy Class, Seat 25C. Duration: 6h 50m. Departure: 22:10 from YYZ Terminal 3. Arrival: 10:00 next day at DUB Terminal 1. Distance: 3,279 miles. Note: Flight duration is 6h 50m but shows local time span from departure to arrival.

2.label: Arrive DUB - Customs & Immigration
2.notes: Arrival at Dublin Airport Terminal 1. Clear customs and immigration. Collect luggage.

2.label: Transport to Hotel
2.notes: Take Airport Express bus or taxi to Dublin city center. Bus 747 or 757 to city center, or taxi approximately €25-35.

2.label: Hotel Check-in
2.notes: Check into hotel in Dublin city center. Drop luggage and freshen up after the overnight flight.

2.label: Light Lunch
2.notes: Quick lunch at a nearby café or pub to get oriented with the area.

2.label: Dublin Castle & City Center Walk
2.notes: Explore Dublin Castle and take a leisurely walk around the city center to get oriented. Visit Trinity College area.

2.label: Temple Bar Area
2.notes: Explore the famous Temple Bar district, known for its traditional Irish pubs and cultural significance.

2.label: Dinner at Traditional Irish Pub
2.notes: Enjoy dinner at a traditional Irish pub, trying local specialties like Irish stew, fish and chips, or shepherd's pie.

2.label: Evening Walk & Rest
2.notes: Evening stroll around the city center to see Dublin lit up at night. Return to hotel for early rest after the long journey.
